column4: What utility is used in the text based install for setting up harddrives? I'm looking to access this tool while inside the livecd.
partman, i think. the gui installer also uses it
oh, yeah cuz the gui doesnt have lvm on the cd at all
youd need to install lvm on the livecd and then manually set it up. i dont know if ubiquity would know what to do with it though
